--- revoke_privileges.sql
REVOKE SELECT(name, level, location), UPDATE(location) ON TABLE employees, contractors FROM ROLE hr_manager, hr_member

--- AST
&ast.Revoke{
  Revoke:    0,
  Privilege: &ast.PrivilegeOnTable{
    Privileges: []ast.TablePrivilege{
      &ast.SelectPrivilege{
        Select:  7,
        Rparen:  35,
        Columns: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 14,
            NameEnd: 18,
            Name:    "name",
          },
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 20,
            NameEnd: 25,
            Name:    "level",
          },
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 27,
            NameEnd: 35,
            Name:    "location",
          },
        },
      },
      &ast.UpdatePrivilege{
        Update:  38,
        Rparen:  53,
        Columns: []*ast.Ident{
          &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 45,
            NameEnd: 53,
            Name:    "location",
          },
        },
      },
    },
    Names: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 64,
        NameEnd: 73,
        Name:    "employees",
      },
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 75,
        NameEnd: 86,
        Name:    "contractors",
      },
    },
  },
  Roles: []*ast.Ident{
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 97,
      NameEnd: 107,
      Name:    "hr_manager",
    },
    &ast.Ident{
      NamePos: 109,
      NameEnd: 118,
      Name:    "hr_member",
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
REVOKE SELECT(name, level, location), UPDATE(location) ON TABLE employees, contractors FROM ROLE hr_manager, hr_member
